meta.name: Base Web Colors
meta.description: Uber Base Web primitive color tokens — primary blue, negative red, warning gold, and positive green scales (50-700), plus black/white and rating star colors. The foundation palette for Base Web React components.

base.$description: Base Web black and white primitives

primaryBlue.$description: Base Web primary blue scale — UI actions and interactive elements

negativeRed.$description: Base Web negative red scale — errors and destructive actions

warningGold.$description: Base Web warning gold scale — caution and alert states

positiveGreen.$description: Base Web positive green scale — success and confirmation states

rating.$description: Base Web rating star colors — active and inactive states
